name: AllAboutVision.com
description: Front end development on the AllAboutVision.com and associated properties including AAV Labs.
author: <jeff.keddy@gmail.com>

scripts.build:css: node-sass --source-map true src/_sass/style.scss -o dist/assets/css/ && postcss dist/assets/css/style.css --use autoprefixer -d dist/assets/css/
scripts.watch:css: node-sass --source-map true -w src/_sass/style.scss -o dist/assets/css/ && cleancss -o dist/assets/css/style.min.css dist/assets/css/style.css
scripts.server: yarn build:clean && concurrently "yarn watch:css" "yarn watch:bundle" "yarn browser"
